name: absolite
effect: Held: Allows Absol to Mega Evolve into Mega Absol.
short_effect: Held: Allows Absol to Mega Evolve into Mega Absol.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Absol hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
